title: Bug 32770 - Java Application Launch Error Message Enhancement
description: This bug report addresses issues with the error message displayed when a Java application launch fails and suggests improving its quality to assist users more effectively.
OB: The observed behavior is that a dialog appears with the message 'Launch failed: no main type found.'
EB: The expected behavior is to enhance the error message to guide users on how to resolve the issue. It should provide a hint about the necessary action, such as selecting a resource. An improved message might read 'Launch failed: No file with a main type selected.'
SR: The steps to reproduce are not provided in the bug report. To better understand the issue, clear and comprehensive steps for reproducing the problem should be included.
